original_title: Recess Monkey: In Tents Live at Teatro ZinZanni
overview: In celebration of their new album "In Tents," Recess Monkey partners with Seattle's Teatro ZinZanni for this unbelievably high-energy circus collaboration! Features the hysterical Peter Pitosky, prima ballerina Arianna Lallone, juggler extraordinaire Sergey Krutokov, kid sensation Saffi Watson, the drumming bear Korum Bischoff and, of course, Recess Monkey!
title: Recess Monkey: In Tents Live at Teatro ZinZanni
